path.style: stroke: rgb(50,200,50); stroke-width: 10; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

circle.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(138,43,226); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

path.style: stroke: rgb(50,200,50); stroke-width: 10; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

text.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(138,43,226); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
